name: Is it Love? Daryl - Boyfriend
description:
1492 Studio was created 5 years ago. The studio quickly established itself as one of the leaders in interactive history with its "Is-it Love?" series of games. The universes: Carter Corp, Mystery Spell, Blue Swan and now Fallen Road, have several tens of millions of downloads. 1492, part of Ubisoft's great family, is in full expansion: new collaborators, new worlds and new stories!
Ubisoft's teams are driven by their commitment to enriching players' lives with original and memorable entertainment experiences. They give life to worlds, real playgrounds where imagination can express itself freely, giving rise to moments of surprise, fun and adventure that also allow the player to learn and discover.
